## IntRange.compare() method

Compare two ranges.

This function is useful for sorting arrays, for example:

```ts
const data = [new IntRange(2, 3), new IntRange(0, 2)];
data.sort(IntRange.compare);

// now data like [ [0..2], [2..3] ]
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
static compare(l: IntRange, r: IntRange): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  l | [IntRange](./nifty-tou.intrange.md) | the left value |
|  r | [IntRange](./nifty-tou.intrange.md) | the right value |

**Returns:**

number

`-1`<!-- -->, `0`<!-- -->, or `1` if `l` is less than, equal to, or greater than `r`
